description: Holding the Isle of Man Santa Dash in the wake of the pandemic would not be responsible, organisers say.
title: Isle of Man Santa Dash postponed over Covid-19 concerns
title_page: Isle of Man Santa Dash postponed over Covid-19 concerns - BBC News
maintext: Concerns over the coronavirus outbreak meant the event "wouldn't be the celebration that the 20th anniversary warrants" and supporting a gathering of so many in the wake of the pandemic would not be responsible, he said.
